los datos de origen presenta 4 años de estudio (desde 2008 a 2011) donde se registra la abundancia de 150 especies distintas 


calculamos la riqueza de especies de escarabajos para cada sitio y año
```{r,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here) 
library(tidylog) 
library(summarytools) 
library(knitr)
library(performance)
library(effects)
library(kableExtra)
```


```{r, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
rawdata <- read.csv("datos/rawdata_bet.csv")
rawdata$YEAR<-as.factor(rawdata$YEAR)

bet_sum<-rawdata %>%
  group_by(PLOT, YEAR) %>%
  summarise(n_species = n(),ABUNDANCE = sum(ABUNDANCE))%>%
  rename(plot=PLOT, year=YEAR, abundance= ABUNDANCE)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE, out.width="80%",}
bet_sum %>% 
    kable("latex",booktabs = TRUE, digits =  4,longtable = T,linesep = "")%>%
  kable_styling(font_size = 8,full_width = F, position="left")
```

\newpage


```{r,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
p1 <- ggplot(bet_sum, aes(x = year,y = n_species)) +
  geom_point(color="blue")
p1
```

```{r,,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
mod_richness = lm(n_species ~ year, data = bet_sum)
summary(mod_richness)

```

\newpage
```{r,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
plot(allEffects(mod_richness))
```

```{r,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
performance::check_model(mod_richness)

```
